title: Degrees & Majors - Georgia State University
description: Learn about all of the degrees and majors available at Georgia State University.
cleaned_text: Degrees & Majors Choose from dozens of nationally ranked and recognized programs and more than 250 majors, minors and pathways at Georgia State offering the widest variety of fields of study. Still Not Sure? Let us help you determine what undergraduate degree or graduate program is right for you. The information shared here is intended to provide an overview of Georgia State's offerings. For details on admissions requirements, tuition, courses and more please refer to the [university catalogs](https://enrollment.gsu.edu/catalogs/).
